snippet.title: Mr.Bree: Returning Home - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
#UPDATE: Mr. Bree is now released on Kongregate! Play and rate it now!! http://www.kongregate.com/games/TawStudio/mr-bree-returning-home


Mr Bree has lost his memory and forgot the way home!
Now he must go through the most unexplored paths of the forest and try to remember how to get back!

For this, he must remember his movements, and perhaps find out the dark events that put him in this place!

-


For Mr. Bree and other updates follow us at Twitter: twitter.com/tawstudio
or through our facebook page:
www.facebook.com/TawStudio

Original Soundtrack available on :
Bandcamp : http://mattschiffertawstudioentertainment.bandcamp.com/album/mr-bree-returning-home-original-soundtrack
iTunes : http://itunes.apple.com/us/album/mr.bree-returning-home-original/id491207948
Amazon : http://www.amazon.com/Mr-Bree-Returning-Home-Original-SoundTrack/dp/B006OIS73E/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1326377006&sr=8-1
